String.Source: What can't you get me, sweetie.
String.Dest: 还有什么你不能帮我弄到的，宝贝儿。

String.Source: How do you know the scene hasn't been tampered with?
String.Dest: 你们怎么能确保现在看到的这些没有被篡改过。

String.Source: Not many people can find the place, to be honest, since it's not on any map.
String.Dest: 说实话，没多少人能找到这个地方。因为那里在任何一份地图上都没有标示。

String.Source: How do you know the scene hasn't been tampered with?
String.Dest: 你们怎么能确保现在看到的这些没有被篡改过。

String.Source: The only reason the guard were able to arrest my father is because he was forced to spend the night in Solitude.
String.Dest: 守卫逮捕我父亲唯一可行的理由就是他非自愿而不得不在独孤城过了一夜。

String.Source: Beauty can reveal the beast in those who desire it.
String.Dest: 美女可以向野兽透露想捕捉它的人。（？）

String.Source: I have so very many ways to deal with people. Even the most savage beasts.
String.Dest: 我有很多与人打交道的方法。即使那人像是最野蛮的野兽。

String.Source: I think you overestimate your beauty, and their intent.
String.Dest: 我觉得你是老孔雀开屏———自作多情。

String.Source: Well, if you say so.
String.Dest: 好吧，如果你这样说的话。

String.Source: Who would want to hurt you? Myself, for one.
String.Dest: 有谁想要伤害你？算我一个！

String.Source: Oh dear! Whatever is a girl to do with such fearful brutes about her.
String.Dest: 哦亲爱的！有这样一个可怕的禽兽在附近，【那就别管姑娘家会做出什么反应来啦】。

String.Source: You are indeed beautiful.
String.Dest: 你真的很美！

String.Source: I know. Few can resist my charms. Even fewer are worthy of them.
String.Dest: 我知道,很少有人能抵挡我的魔力。而值得我为之展示这份魅力的人就少之又少了。

String.Source: Is everyone treating you well? This place has a rough history.
String.Dest: 大家对你还好吗？这地方可是出了名的粗暴。

String.Source: Oh I don't believe those rumors my friend. Besides, who would ever want to harm such beauty?
String.Dest: 噢朋友我可不信那一套。另外，谁会想要伤害这样的美人儿呢？

String.Source: I need to take of some business. Enjoy your stay.
String.Dest: 我有些事情需要去忙了，希望你过的愉快。.

String.Source: Later then.
String.Dest: Later then.

String.Source: I need to take of some business. Enjoy your stay.
String.Dest: 我有些事情需要去忙了，希望你过的愉快。.

String.Source: I have to go. Thanks for your time.
String.Dest: 我得走了，感谢你的帮助。

String.Source: You're welcome.
String.Dest: 不用客气。

String.Source: You're welcome.
String.Dest: 欢迎。

String.Source: Take care of yourself.
String.Dest: 照顾好自己。

String.Source: I'll see you around.
String.Dest: 那就再见吧。

String.Source: I hope we bump into each other again.
String.Dest: 希望我们有机会再见面。

String.Source: As you will.
String.Dest: 如你所愿。

String.Source: See you around, handsome.
String.Dest: 再见了帅哥儿。

String.Source: See you around, my beauty.
String.Dest: 再见了美人儿。

String.Source: Would you like to buy a lady a drink?
String.Dest: 你能请一位女士喝一杯吗？

String.Source: Well aren't you the handsome one. You and I should spend some time together.
String.Dest: 好了，你难道不是个帅气的家伙么？你我应共度一段美好时光。

String.Source: Well aren't you the pretty one. I bet all the men chase after you.
String.Dest: 哇噢你真是个美人儿啊。身边一定有一堆的男人追着吧。

String.Source: You look like an adventurous one. I bet we're kindred spirits, you and I.
String.Dest: 你看起来像一个爱冒险的人。我觉得我们志趣相投，你和我。

String.Source: Want to talk? Go ahead.
String.Dest: 想谈谈吗？请便。

String.Source: Ed, how can I argue with that. Thank you.
String.Dest: 艾德，我怎么能就那个跟你吵呢。谢谢你。

String.Source: Hm? I smell blood.
String.Dest: 嗯？我闻到了血腥味。

String.Source: {Applause}
String.Dest: {掌声}

String.Source: {Applause}
String.Dest: {掌声}

String.Source: You don't have enough gold, and I'm not cutting any deals.
String.Dest: 我总不能因为你带不够钱而降低交易价格吧。
